<s>You examine the desk.</s> <s>It's rather large, and made of a sturdy wood.</s> <s>Tucked into it is a comfortable spinning chair.</s> <s>The main fixture on the desk is a COMPUTER equipped with a keyboard and mouse.</s> <s>However, you also find <il><item>a PISTOL</item></il>.</s>

<desc><if cond="this.childPuzzle.solved === true"><var v="this.childPuzzle.alreadySolvedDescription" /></if><if cond="this.childPuzzle.solved === false"><s>The computer is asking for a USERNAME and PASSWORD.</s></if> <s>Stuck to the top of the monitor is a note that says "User: anagram 1. Password: anagram 2."</s> <s>(Note: To log in, send `.use username USERNAME`, then `.use password PASSWORD`, then `.use login`.)</s></desc>

It's a video file. You hit play.

At first, it appears to only be showing you a dark wall. But then, after a few seconds, a figure walks into the frame and looks at the camera. The person's face is obscured by a black plague doctor mask with tinted glasses. They also wear a black cloak with white highlights along the hems. You know who this is: the **mastermind**. They begin to speak with a deep, distorted voice:
"So we meet again. I will spare you the pleasantries and get right down to business.

First, I would like to congratulate you on surviving the killing game. I never intended for any of you to survive. This game was set up to kill every last one of you. In the event that a culprit survived a class trial, I would have been in this very room waiting to kill them, finally putting an end to you members of Ultimate Despair. If you are watching this, then that did not happen. I will not kill any of you, and you will be given the chance to graduate and re-enter the outside world.

Next, I must admit that the road ahead of us is filled with uncertainties. The Future Foundation has almost certainly taken notice of the program by now, and I expect that they are taking actions to stop it. How they will do so is a mystery even to me. Additionally, I cannot say what they will decide to do after the program has been shut down. You and I have found ourselves at a crossroads, with each diverging path obscured by a thick fog. What sort of climax will we reach? I await the answer with eager anticipation.

When next you see me, the whole truth will be unveiled. Now then, I bid you adieu once more. Until we meet again."

The video ends.

<desc><s>It's a button at the bottom lower left of the screen.</s> <s>You can log out of the current account with this.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the filing cabinet.</s> <s>It's gray with metal handles, and none of the drawers are locked.</s> <s>All of the drawers except the top one are empty.</s> <s>In the top drawer, you find <il><item>a JOURNAL ENTRY</item> and <item>a LIST</item></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the couch.</s> <s>It's white and rather large, with the end facing away from the corner of the room having no arm rest, presumably to allow someone to sleep on it comfortably.</s> <s>On it are <il><item>a PILLOW</item> and <item>a COMFORTER</item></il>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a large group photo.</s> <s>There are a number of people in both the LEFT and RIGHT side of the picture.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It’s a group photo with many familiar faces.</s> <s>There are eight of them on the left side.</s> <s>They all wear black cloaks with white trim.</s> <s>You recognize the person on the far left as Adrian.</s> <s>He wears his goggles and has a closed-lip smile on his face, which is framed with long, shaggy black hair.</s> <s>Beside him is Christopher, who stands with his arms folded, wearing a surprisingly big smile.</s> <s>To his right, Pearl looks soberly at the ground.</s> <s>His eye patch is blood red, and his once white hair is now jet black.</s> <s>To Pearl’s right, Johnny grins maniacally at the camera, a purple scar noticeable across his cheek.</s> <s>Yoruneko is next.</s> <s>Her black and white cloak replaces her purple cape, but besides that, she wears her usual costume.</s> <s>You notice a small tear in the top of her mask, but otherwise it’s intact.</s> <s>She grins, striking a ‘supervillain’ pose.</s> <s>To her right, Faust stares blankly into the camera.</s> <s>His hair is cut quite short.</s> <s>Juno stands beside him and sneers at the camera, his fingers and clothes adorned with a gaudy assortment of jewels.</s> <s>Zoran crouches in front of him.</s> <s>His hair is longer, and everything from his snarling expression to his body language makes him look especially feral.</s> <s>You see the others on the RIGHT side of the photo.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It’s a group photo with many familiar faces.</s> <s>There are nine of them on the right side.</s> <s>They all wear black cloaks with white trim.</s> <s>Kyra stands to the right of Zoran and Juno, not looking at the camera.</s> <s>She looks as if she’s unhappy to be there.</s> <s>To her right, Holly’s expression is void of emotion as Cass wraps a bandage around her arm.</s> <s>Anzu is next.</s> <s>Her hair is more unkempt, but her expression is solemn.</s> <s>Ikeda stands next to her, wearing the biggest grin you’ve ever seen on her.</s> <s>She looks like she might have been laughing as the photo was taken.</s> <s>Oshiro is next.</s> <s>Her typically impeccable outfit and hair seem to be slightly out of order, and she tilts her head to the side as she smiles for the camera.</s> <s>Beside her, Yuu winks at the camera, his now pink hair in a long braid.</s> <s>Next is Cara.</s> <s>Her hair is long and unruly, left down with the exception of two small twintails pulled up on each side.</s> <s>She’s clinging to Nero’s arm, staring up at him with obvious infatuation.</s> <s>Nero himself simply smirks at the camera, a smug expression on his face.</s></desc>
<desc><s>The elevator looks to be average size.</s> <s>There's a CALL BUTTON on the wall next to it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>This is a rather strange call button.</s> <s>You don't select whether you want to go up or down.</s> <s>All it does is call the elevator to this floor.</s> <if cond="this.childPuzzle.accessible === true"><s>It's currently lit up, inviting you to press it.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>This is a standard gray bin with a plastic trash bag inside.</s> <s>Inside, you find <il></il>.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>That's funny, why is there a tiny version of you in here?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>It's an extremely large pot for mixing things.</s> <s>It doesn't seem to use electricity, meaning you have to mix things by hand.</s> <s>In it is <il><item>a GIANT MIXING SPOON</item></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a large, stainless steel sink.</s> <if cond="this.activated"><s>Water is currently coming out of the faucet at a high pressure.</s></if> <s>It has two knobs, one for hot water and one for cold water.</s> <s>In it, you find <il></il>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>It's a wide wooden pantry.</s> <s>You open it up and look inside.</s> <s>In it, you find <il>lots of CANS OF TOMATO SOUP</il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a window into the mess hall.</s> <if cond="game.var = findPuzzle('CRANK', 'canteen').solved; game.var === true"><s>You can see right into it.</s> <if cond="findRoom('mess-hall').occupantsString !== ''"><s>You see <var v="findRoom('mess-hall').occupantsString" /> in there.</s></if> <s>The window is big enough that you could hop right through to the other side.</s></if><if cond="game.var === false"><s>The window is blocked with a shutter which you can't seem to open.</s> <s>On the shutter is a single letter in red paint: n.</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>It's a large, mechanical crank.</s> <s>If you turn it, something will probably happen.</s></desc>

<desc><s>The bolt is just above the door handle, and allows you to lock the door from inside the room.</s> <if cond="this.childPuzzle.solved === true"><s>It's currently unlocked.</s></if><if cond="this.childPuzzle.solved === false"><s>It's currently locked.</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>It's a black, plastic dome on a white, circular shell attached to the ceiling.</s> <s>It gives you the feeling that you're being watched.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a small, flat-screen television with a beige, plastic border.</s> <s>It has a set of abnormally large speakers attached to the sides.</s> <if cond="findEvent('LETS KILL EACHOTHER').ongoing === true"><s>It's blaring an awful song so loudly you can hardly think.</s> <s>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOB0A_mphX8</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>The floor is covered in a black carpet, presumably to help reduce echo.</s> <s>You find <il></il> placed haphazardly on it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the chairs.</s> <s>They are all lined with red velvet and have seats that flip upwards when no one is sitting on them.</s> <s>They're all bolted to the floor.</s> <s>Taking the time to count them, you find that there are 13 chairs in each row, and there are 17 rows in total.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You look through the window into CONTROL ROOM 1.</s> <s>All you can really see is some kind of control panel with a bunch of switches.</s> <if cond="findRoom('control-room-1').occupantsString !== ''"><s>However, you also see <var v="findRoom('control-room-1').occupantsString" /> inside.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You look through the window into CONTROL ROOM 2.</s> <s>All you can really see is some kind of control panel with a bunch of switches.</s> <if cond="findRoom('control-room-2').occupantsString !== ''"><s>However, you also see <var v="findRoom('control-room-2').occupantsString" /> inside.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You look at the stage lights.</s> <s>They are fairly big, and pointed directly at the stage's BACKGROUND.</s> <s>The left stage light is currently <var v="findPuzzle('LEFT STAGE LIGHT SWITCH').outcome" />.</s> <s>The right stage light is currently <var v="findPuzzle('RIGHT STAGE LIGHT SWITCH').outcome" />.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the stage.</s> <s>The wooden planks it's made of show lots of signs of wear, suggesting that they've been through many years of use.</s> <s>In the middle of the stage is a TRAP DOOR.</s> <s>On either side of the stage are CURTAINS.</s> <s>You also find <il></il> placed haphazardly on it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You look more closely at the trap door.</s> <s>It's large enough for just about anyone to fall through it.</s> <s>It is equipped with a COMBINATION LOCK<if cond="findPuzzle('COMBINATION LOCK', 'theater').solved === true">, however it has been solved, so the trap door is open</if>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You examine the combination lock.</s> <s>The combination consists of four digits ranging from 0-9.</s></desc>
<desc><s>The curtains on either side of the stage are made of red velvet, and are drawn open.</s> <s>You can't seem to find any way to close them.</s> <s>Maybe you could hide in them?</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a white shelf with several wig mannequins built into it.</s> <s>You find <il><item>a WHITE WIG</item>, <item>a DARK BROWN WIG</item>, <item>a BLACK WIG</item>, <item>a PINK WIG</item>, <item>a LIGHT BROWN WIG</item>, and <item>a RED WIG</item></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the crates.</s> <s>There are four of them: CRATES 1 - 4, all lined up in a row.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a rather large, wooden crate.</s> <s>This one is open.</s> <s>It's filled to the brim with ammunition magazines.</s> <if cond="player.name === 'Oshiro'"><s>Taking a closer look at them, they appear to contain 7.62×39mm M43 bullets, commonly used in AK-47s and some machine guns. </s></if><s>Without a gun to shoot these, they're harmless.</s> <s>You also find <il></il>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the television.</s> <s>It's a large, flat screen TV mounted on the wall.</s> <s>It's showing a documentary about Makoto Tamochi's life.</s> <s>He was born to a poor family in the slums of Tokyo.</s> <s>He lived a terrible life for most of his childhood until he was introduced to the Danganronpa franchise, which inspired in him a feeling of hope.</s> <s>He worked hard in school so that he could have a better life, which led to him being accepted into an elite American school as an international student.</s> <s>There, he studied business and met his eventual wife, Melanie.</s> <s>After the birth of their son, Makoto Tamochi won the lottery and became an instant millionaire.</s> <s>Ever since then, he's increased his wealth through various business ventures.</s> <s>He was a staunch opponent of the Danganronpa series' transition to using real participants beginning with its 50th entry.</s> <s>When the 53rd season brought about the end of the franchise and nearly caused a global tragedy, he used his wealth to establish a real-world Hope's Peak Academy to foster the world's hope.</s> <s>Even after only being in operation for 3 years, its alumni have gone on to do incredible things that have made the world a better place.</s> <s>For example, Victoria Takayoshi, the Former Ultimate Biologist from Hope's Peak's first graduating class, invented a biomass reactor that converts organic waste into usable energy.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a small, flat-screen television with a beige, plastic border.</s> <s>It has a set of abnormally large speakers attached to the sides.</s> <if cond="findEvent('LETS KILL EACHOTHER').ongoing === true"><s>It's blaring an awful song so loudly you can hardly think.</s> <s>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOB0A_mphX8</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>The floor is made of beautifully polished stone tiles.</s> <s>You find <il></il> placed haphazardly on it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the first painting.</s> <s>It's titled "Tragedy On The City".</s> <s>It depicts a distant city skyline.</s> <s>The sky is a striking red color, and the ocean beyond the city is black.</s> <s>Several skyscrapers in the city are in terrible shape, some of them even looking like they've been cut short.</s> <s>Black smoke rises out of the city center.</s> <s>The painting gives you a terrifying look into a city on the brink of absolute destruction.</s> <s>This painting doesn't depict a real scene... does it?</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the second painting.</s> <s>It's titled "Nikola and Shinobu".</s> <s>It depicts two young women who look very familiar to you in a plain, white room.</s> <s>The woman on the left has short, choppy, and unkempt red hair.</s> <s>She has her arm around the other woman, who's slightly taller than her, and throws up a peace sign with her other hand, with a wide smile on her face.</s> <s>The other woman, who looks to be Japanese with black hair done up in two long twintails, scowls at her, all the while holding a knife to her throat.</s> <s>Both of them wear black cloaks with white highlights along the hems, though they've let their hoods down.</s> <s>The cloaks appear to be stained with blood.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the third painting.</s> <s>It's titled "A Mighty March on Tokyo".</s> <s>It depicts <if cond="player.hasAttribute('knows japanese')">Shibuya Square</if><if cond="!player.hasAttribute('knows japanese')">a wide street</if> in Tokyo.</s> <s>An individual in a black cloak with white highlights along the hems, sword in hand, leads what looks to be an army of people wearing Monokuma masks.</s> <s>The cloak is painted in such a way that the leader's face is completely obscured.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the fourth painting.</s> <s>It's titled "La destruction de la tour Eiffel".</s> <s>It depicts what looks to be Paris beneath a dark, cloudy sky.</s> <s>Where the Eiffel Tower once stood is now nothing but a mound of smoking rubble.</s> <s>There are ambulances all over the painting, some even crushed by rubble.</s> <s>It's a horrific scene.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the fifth painting.</s> <s>It's titled "Le cirque du désespoir".</s> <s>It depicts a woman with long, white hair in some kind of circus tent falling to her death above a floor covered in spikes, some kind of net burning on top of them.</s> <s>She has a terrified expression on her face, and an audience of Monokumas seems to be cheering in the stands.</s></desc>
<desc><s>The benches have red velvet cushions with intricately crafted gold legs.</s> <s>You find <il></il> on them.</s></desc>

<desc><s>It's a small, flat-screen television with a beige, plastic border.</s> <s>It has a set of abnormally large speakers attached to the sides.</s> <if cond="findEvent('LETS KILL EACHOTHER').ongoing === true"><s>It's blaring an awful song so loudly you can hardly think.</s> <s>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOB0A_mphX8</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>The floor is made of hardwood.</s> <s>You find <il></il> placed haphazardly on it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You examine the screens.</s> <s>Each one is a large TV screen, but there are no buttons on any of them.</s> <if cond="game.var = findPuzzle('VIDEO PODIUM'); game.var.solved === true"><s>They're all playing a video.</s> <if cond="game.var.outcome === '54_COLIN_SNAPS_AT_EMILY.MP4'"><s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MTBpKn5FNxW7HG9mMr_Zm48eHUtDHnrFUJ8eIsaYEU8/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.outcome === '54_DEVYNS_CALLOUT.MP4'"><s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ScApZMeV3Cs-X8s_S-icwdbRiwXTq2L1FP0wH25fb6A/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.outcome === '54_SCARLET_BLACKENED.MP4'"><s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/18U19ynbel4EPyslrL6ev5cMdzFJdeOoc3iG3wXOblb4/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.outcome === '55_KUMAHARI_MASS_SUICIDE.MP4'"><s>(CW: Mass suicide.)</s> <s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gb9FeEAmg3_gxu2SZPF3Bf73MJSN-PAQr-cuTkkiG58/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.outcome === '55_AIRIS_BETRAYAL.MP4'"><s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EN3g28uCxEgvslUBqJYLx7yxtchQYYO982Fq-v97TbA/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.outcome === '55_THE_REVIVAL.MP4'"><s>(CW: Body horror.)</s> <s>https://docs.google.com/document/d/14D8hKlAwl3T_0Eobc7-zKADA7tB1gIfklqUJfKnpcdg/edit?usp=sharing</s></if><if cond="game.var.solved === false"><s>They're all currently off.</s></if></desc>

You examine the podium. It looks just like the podiums found in the trial grounds, even coming equipped with a screen. However, in place of a person's picture and number is a list of video files:
54_COLIN_SNAPS_AT_EMILY.MP4
54_DEVYNS_CALLOUT.MP4
54_SCARLET_BLACKENED.MP4
55_AIRIS_BETRAYAL.MP4
55_KUMAHARI_MASS_SUICIDE.MP4
55_THE_REVIVAL.MP4
(Note: In order to play a video, send `.use podium FILENAME`. The filename must be given in all caps.)
